zh.title: 雪崩币/美元技术分析：[震荡整理趋势]
zh.content:
当前雪崩币（AVAX）在12.78美元附近交易，显示出震荡整理的趋势。24小时内价格变化微乎其微，表明市场参与者对当前价格水平持观望态度。高点和低点的波动相对较小，进一步确认了市场的稳定性。短期内，价格可能会在12.75美元至12.83美元之间波动。

在技术指标方面，MACD显示出轻微的上升动能，但由于信号线数据尚未提供，需谨慎解读。SMA(20)位于12.58美元，作为短期支撑位，若价格下破该水平，可能会引发进一步的卖压。此外，RSI(14)的缺失使得我们无法判断超买或超卖情况，需密切关注未来的市场动态。

就支撑与阻力位而言，支撑位在12.75美元，而阻力位则在12.83美元。若价格突破12.83美元，可能会吸引更多买盘，从而推动价格进一步上涨。反之，若跌破12.75美元，则可能会引发更多抛售，导致价格回落。

在交易建议方面，建议投资者采取观望策略，等待价格突破阻力位或支撑位以确认趋势。若突破12.83美元，可考虑逢低买入，反之则应谨慎止损，以控制风险。保持灵活应变的策略，将有助于把握市场机会。

en.title: Avalanche vs US Dollar Technical Analysis
en.content:
Avalanche (AVAX) is currently trading at 12.7832, showing a minor decline of 0.01% over the past 24 hours. The price has oscillated between 12.8281 and 12.7513 during the same period, indicating a relatively tight trading range. This sideways movement suggests that the market is currently indecisive. However, the recent price levels are above the 20-day simple moving average (SMA) of 12.57867, which may indicate a bullish short-term trend if the price maintains above this support level.

The absence of a current Relative Strength Index (RSI) reading makes it challenging to assess momentum accurately. However, the MACD value of 0.0908 suggests a bullish sentiment, as the MACD line is above the signal line, indicating potential upward momentum. Traders should watch for a confirmation of this bullish trend through an increase in volume or a break above the recent high of 12.8281, which could signal a further upward movement.

On the support side, the recent low of 12.7513 acts as a crucial support level. Should the price breach this level, it could lead to increased selling pressure, potentially driving it down to test lower support around 12.50. Conversely, a successful hold above this support, coupled with positive volume, could encourage buyers to push towards the resistance at 12.8281 and beyond, possibly targeting the next psychological level of 13.00.

Traders may consider a cautious approach, waiting for a clear breakout above 12.8281 to enter long positions. Conversely, if the price falls below 12.7513, it may be prudent to reassess positions and consider shorting opportunities. Employing stop-loss orders around these critical levels can help manage risk effectively in this uncertain market environment.
